project_descr: This Programme is to support the Government of Fiji in strengthening their national capacities to effectively and efficiently plan for, access, manage, deploy and monitor climate financing in particular through the GCF once it is fully operational.

outputs.output_descr: The Programme will implement activities that are inline to the Fiji National Climate Change Policy.
